roomDescription: Kyle wakes up alone in a dimly lit, industrial-chic workspace, the hum of Edison bulbs casting long shadows across the cluttered table. The air smells of stale coffee and snack food, and the red curtains near the back of the room sway slightly, as if hiding something—or someone—just out of sight. The door is locked, and the only way out is to unravel the clues left behind in this lived-in, creative chaos.
winCondition: Find the hidden key beneath the drum kit and use it to unlock the red curtains, revealing the exit behind them.
loseCondition: Kyle panics and collapses after 15 failed attempts to solve the riddles, leaving him trapped in the room indefinitely.

frame.description: This is the whiteboard, a large dry-erase board mounted on the dark wall near the far end of the room. It carries remnants of brainstorming sessions — scribbled diagrams, sticky notes, and half-erased marker strokes, standing as a silent record of collaborative planning.
frame.pov: Looking directly at the whiteboard from a close vantage point, with the dark wall filling the background and the edge of the central table just barely visible below.

clue.discovery: Kyle notices a faint, half-erased diagram on the whiteboard—a series of arrows pointing toward the picture next to it. Beneath the scribbles, a single word stands out in red marker: 'BEGIN'.
clue.premature_discovery: The whiteboard is covered in dry-erase scribbles, but nothing seems to stand out. Kyle tries to wipe away some of the marks, but the surface is too smudged to reveal anything useful.
clue.riddle: I hang where ideas take flight, yet I’m not the board. Look beside me to find your next reward. What am I?
clue.hiddenAreaDescription: Behind the whiteboard, partially obscured by a loose corner of the board, is a small magnetic tray holding a single sticky note with a riddle written in bold marker.

frame.description: This is the picture, a framed artwork or photograph hanging on the dark wall adjacent to the whiteboard. Its details are partially obscured by the room's moody lighting, but it adds a subtle decorative touch to the otherwise utilitarian workspace.
frame.pov: Facing the framed picture on the wall at roughly eye level, with the surrounding dark wall texture visible and the faint glow of Edison bulbs reflecting off the glass surface.

clue.discovery: Kyle tilts the framed picture slightly and hears a faint *click*. The back of the frame is loose, and inside, a small envelope is taped to the backing. It contains a riddle and a tiny, folded note with the word 'STUDIO' scrawled on it.
clue.premature_discovery: The picture is firmly mounted to the wall, and no matter how Kyle tugs, it won’t budge. The glass is smudged, but there’s nothing unusual about the frame itself.
clue.riddle: I stand tall where light is made, my head adjusts to cast no shade. Seek me where the shadows fade. What am I?
clue.hiddenAreaDescription: Inside the back of the framed picture, a small envelope is taped to the backing board. The envelope is slightly yellowed, as if it’s been there for a while, and contains a folded note.

frame.description: This is the studio light, a tall professional lighting fixture positioned towards the back of the room. Its adjustable head and sturdy tripod stand give the space a creative, production-ready feel alongside the industrial Edison bulbs overhead.
frame.pov: Looking towards the studio light standing in the deeper section of the room, its tall silhouette rising above the surrounding furniture, with the dark ceiling and exposed ductwork visible behind it.

clue.discovery: Kyle crouches beside the studio light and notices a small compartment at the base of the tripod. Inside, there’s a keycard with a drumstick symbol etched into it. A note reads: 'Rhythm holds the key.'
clue.premature_discovery: The studio light is unplugged, and its head is tilted downward. Kyle fiddles with the knobs, but nothing happens—it’s as if it’s waiting for something to power it on.
clue.riddle: I keep the beat but never play, my symbol guards the hidden way. Find where rhythm holds its sway. What am I?
clue.hiddenAreaDescription: At the base of the studio light’s tripod, a small, hidden compartment is revealed when a panel is slid aside. Inside, a keycard lies on a bed of foam, its surface etched with a drumstick symbol.

frame.description: This is the drums, a drum kit set up in a far corner of the space, well away from the central work table. Its presence adds a creative, eclectic character to the room — a reminder that this space serves more than just office work.
frame.pov: Looking across the room towards the distant drum kit tucked into the far corner, with cymbals and drum shells faintly visible past the clutter of the main workspace area.

clue.discovery: Kyle lifts the snare drum and finds a small, locked compartment beneath it. The keycard from the studio light fits perfectly, and inside is a small brass key. As he picks it up, the red curtains near the back of the room rustle slightly, as if inviting him closer.
clue.premature_discovery: The drum kit looks untouched, but the snare drum is oddly heavy. Kyle tries to lift it, but it won’t budge—something is holding it in place.
clue.riddle: I part the way when you’re near, my color bold, my purpose clear. Unlock me to disappear. What am I?
clue.hiddenAreaDescription: Beneath the snare drum, a small compartment is built into the drum stand. The compartment is lined with black felt, and inside, a brass key gleams under the dim light.

frame.description: This is the chair near the curtain, positioned close to the large opening framed by vibrant red curtains that separate this room from the adjacent area. The chair sits slightly apart from the main table, as if placed for a quick conversation or observation.
frame.pov: Looking at the chair situated near the red curtains, with the draped fabric visible just beyond and the glow from the adjacent space casting a faint light on the chair's surface.

clue.discovery: Kyle approaches the red curtains and notices a small keyhole hidden in the wooden frame. The brass key fits perfectly, and as he turns it, the curtains swing open to reveal a dimly lit hallway beyond. With a deep breath, he steps through and escapes the room.
clue.premature_discovery: The chair near the curtains is empty, but the red fabric is drawn tightly shut. Kyle tugs at the curtains, but they won’t budge—something is holding them closed.
clue.hiddenAreaDescription: Behind the red curtains, a small keyhole is concealed in the wooden frame of the doorway. The brass key fits snugly, and when turned, the curtains part to reveal a narrow hallway bathed in faint light.

frame.description: This frame offers a direct view of the table's surface and the items on it from one end. The bookshelves on the left are visible, and the perspective on the windowed wall is frontal, with the patterned rug partially visible in the foreground.
frame.pov: A head-on view of the tabletop from one end, making the windowed wall central in the background, with the bookshelves still visible on the left.

frame.description: This frame is close to the table and shifted to the right. The books on the left are mostly out of frame, and more of the dark wall space to the right of the windows becomes visible.
frame.pov: Close to the table and shifted to the right, bringing more of the right-hand wall and less of the left bookshelves into view, with the windowed wall still prominent.

frame.description: This frame is closer to the end of the table, looking towards the whiteboard and into the background. A person is visible seated at a desk further back in the room, and another section of bookshelves or cabinets is on the far right.
frame.pov: Closer to the table and looking towards the far right end of the room, emphasizing the whiteboard and showing a person seated at a desk in the background. The perspective is now less about the full table length and more about the room's depth in this direction.

frame.description: This frame is even closer to the left side of the table, looking directly through the parted red curtains. More details of the adjacent area are visible, including people, additional seating, and a decorative fireplace. The table remains laden with laptops and drinks.
frame.pov: Moved closer to the table's left side, offering a clearer view through the parted red curtains into an adjacent brightly lit area with additional seating and people, making the table's items appear more in the foreground.

frame.pov: Looking down slightly at the fire extinguisher affixed to the wall, its vivid red cylinder standing out against the dark surroundings, with the floor and base of nearby furniture visible.

frame.pov: Looking down at the laptop on the table surface from a slightly elevated angle, with its illuminated screen visible alongside nearby cables, drink containers, and other personal items.

frame.pov: A close-up view of the Dorrito packet resting on the wooden table surface, surrounded by nearby laptops, cables, and beverage containers, with the dark room stretching out behind.
